attributes.action: Encourage serving politicians to use public services where available.
attributes.background: Make the Tory slogan "We're in this together" a reality. Perhaps those in charge of our public services, our schools and our healthcare might think carefully about the importance of education for our children and the health of our families if they shared our concerns over the service being provided.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Decisions about what services to use are the responsibility of the individual and not the UK Government and Parliament.
